annotations.description: A Classic hair of the dog cocktail from 1800's Bartender Harry Johnson. The Morning Glory Fizz can be seen in print a lot throughout the 1800's, it makes an ...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Morning Glory Fizz

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Blended Scotch
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
1 Egg White

Shake dry then with ice. 

Absinthe Rinse 
Top Soda Water
Orange Peel Garnish

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wbv79xi7pGE&t=474s
title: Morning Glory Fizz
